title: Hypermedia Learning Design for ATP Synthase Structure and Function

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Optimization of smartphone-based learning environments required. Blended delivery with face-to-face sessions and online modules.

learning_goals: Students can accurately describe the structural features of ATP synthase by comparing its 2D/3D models.
Students can reconstruct the functional processes of ATP synthase, including the rotary catalytic mechanism, using visual materials.
Learners can recall core biochemistry terminology with over 80% accuracy by utilizing visual cues provided in a hypermedia environment.

resources: ATP Synthase Structural Model (Simplified 3D Printing Kit)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
